resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81707</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81707</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4747</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Research Topic</string>
            <string language="es">El tema Investigación</string>
            <string language="ga">An Topaic Taighde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Forschung Thema</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Sujet de Recherches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Tópico Da Pesquisa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Soggetto Di Ricerca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ερευνητικό θέμα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An outline for both teachers and students of the various stages in the choice, preparation and presentation of a Research Topic for the higher level, LC History examination.</string>
            <string language="es">Una descripción tanto para los profesores como para los estudiantes de varias etapas en la elección, preparación y presentación de un tema de investigación para el nivel superior del examen de Historia del LC.</string>
            <string language="ga">Imlíne do mhúinteoirí agus daltaí araon de na staideanna éagsúla i roghnú, réiteach agus cur i láthair Topaic Taighde don scrúdú Staire ardleibhéil san Ardteist.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">History</string>
            <string language="es">Historia</string>
            <string language="ga">Stair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Working with Evidence</string>
            <string language="es">Trabajos con pruebas</string>
            <string language="ga">Ag Obair le Fianaise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine umreiß für Lehrer und Kursteilnehmer der 
verschiedenen Stadien in der Wahl, in der Vorbereitung und in der 
Darstellung eines Forschung Themas für die höhere Stufe, LC 
Geschichte Prüfung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un contour pour des professeurs et des étudiants 
des diverses étapes dans le choix, la préparation et la 
présentation d'un sujet de recherches pour le niveau plus élevé, 
examen d'histoire de LC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um esboço para  professores e estudantes dos 
vários estágios na escolha, na preparação e na apresentação de 
um tópico da pesquisa para o nível mais elevado, examinação do 
history do LC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un profilo per sia gli insegnanti che gli allievi 
di varie fasi nella scelta, nella preparazione e nella presentazione 
di un soggetto di ricerca per il livello elevato, esame di storia di 
LC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα περίγραμμα και για τους δασκάλους και για τους 
σπουδαστές των διάφορων σταδίων στην επιλογή, την προετοιμασία 
και την παρουσίαση ενός ερευνητικού θέματος για το πιό υψηλό 
επίπεδο, εξέταση ιστορίας LC.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeiten mit Beweis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Travailler avec l'évidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalhar com evidência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzionando con la prova</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασία με τα στοιχεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
